text: @realDonaldTrump @LouDobbs Stay on topic dude. It’s crazy talk to politicize this & then tell others not to. Do COVID-19 in 2020 and stop telling stories. We are so over the whining and finger pointing. You are not the victim. Try to act like a leader. Try it one day. No tweets. No blaming. No name-calling
